channel.title: Donation
channel.description: ok well i got a 317 and everything but can i get sued or anything for making people donate for admin or mod or for items?

@JoshB wrote:

You can accept donations. However you cannot give specials privileges to players who donate.

item.title: Donation
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“pkakidjr1, post:10, topic:282800”][quote author=`Rich link=topic=373699.msg2818734#msg2818734 date=1244438036]
The popular servers accept donations because it keeps the server running, they aren’t doing it for profit (besides a few of them), if you’re doing it for profit, then you’re a faggot.
[/quote]Your such a little fucking cunt dude, cussing out the newbies, sad, she/he was just asking a simple question? Is there something wrong with that.[/quote]

I gave him an answer.

Also, no one is going to donate to his server unless it’s actually worth playing (as downloading one and calling it your own won’t help), unless the person who donated is a moron.

Read full topic
